episodes.title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to make chocolate chip pancakes with this new startcooking video.  No need to buy a box of pancake mix, making delicious pancakes from scratch is easy. Follow the instructions and get the maple syrup ready.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: Beef Stew
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Beef stew makes for a hearty and tasty meal. There's no need to be a chef with these tips and techniques on how to make beef stew - just follow my easy step-by-step video instructions and you'll be cooking like a pro!

episodes.title: French Onion Soup
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Some say onions will make you cry ... but this is really a small price to pay for a delicious French onion soup. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Santa Fe Chili
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Santa Fe chili is a classic recipe. Learn how to make your own Santa Fe chili with this simple step-by-step video.

episodes.title: Baked Cod and Microwave Salmon
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Two great ways to make a tasty fish dinner with almost no preparation at all.

episodes.title: Nutella Crepes
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Are you having people over for brunch? Watch this startcooking recipe video to learn how to make Nutella crepes. They are easy to make and can be prepared ahead of time. You cannot go wrong with crepes and Nutella.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: Rudolf’s Christmas Cookies
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: The holiday season is here - time for Christmas cookies. This recipe video shows you how to make these special treats. They remind me of Rudolf and so I thought I would call them Rudolf's Christmas Cookies. I hope you like them. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Roasted Chicken
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: It may seem daunting, but with this simple recipe, you CAN roast a chicken!

episodes.title: Microwave Baked Potatoes
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Healthy and low in calories, baked potatoes are easy to prepare if you have the right techniques. With this quick microwave recipe, you'll have your baked potato ready in no time! Watch the video and let us know what you think. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Lasagna
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Easy lasagna recipe video: Here is the secret on how to create the magic layers for an amazing pasta meal.

episodes.title: English Muffin Pizzas
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: English Muffin Pizzas are a great snack or a meal, and they're perfect for a party. They take no time to prepare and they cook up in just 10 minutes.

episodes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Everyone loves chocolate chip cookies! This step-by-step video on how to make chocolate chip cookies will give you all the tips and techniques you need to bake your own fantastic cookies. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Microwaving Bacon
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Cooking bacon does not need to be difficult.  Watch this startcooking video to learn a simple and easy way to microwave bacon. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Shrimp Scampi
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Shrimp scampi are delicious and can be cooked in minutes! They are perfect when you have no time to cook. You just have to follow a few simple steps and you'll be ready to eat a tasty, zesty meal!

episodes.title: Cooking White Rice
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Before making any of your favorite rice dishes, you'll need the basics of cooking white rice. This is what this video provides. It prepares you for any recipe that includes white rice. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Omelet with Cheese
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Omelets are great for breakfast or lunch and only take two minutes to prepare. This recipe video will show you how to combine eggs and shredded cheese to make the best cheese omelets.

episodes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: You can make a delicious and tasty chicken stir-fry very quickly! This video will guide you each step of the way, and in no time you'll be cooking your very own chicken stir-fry! Enjoy!

episodes.title: Guy Kawasaki’s Famous Teriyaki Sauce
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Guy Kawasaki and startcooking.com team up to bring you this amazing BBQ marinade. Guy Kawasaki's famous teriyaki sauce is perfect for beef or chicken.  You will be sure to impress your guests.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: Vegetable & Dip Platter
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: How to make a great vegetable and dip platter. This video will show all the steps to put together a great vegetable platter as well as accompanying dips.

episodes.title: Chocolate Fudge Brownies
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to make chocolate fudge brownies with startcooking's new recipe video. Your friends and family will enjoy this delicious treat. Chocolate brownies are everyone's favorite. So get to work. Cheers!

episodes.title: Quiche With Ham And Cheese
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: For a dish that looks and tastes so sophisticated, quiche is surprisingly quick and easy to make. Who knew?

episodes.title: Three Good Kitchen Knives
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to use and sharpen kitchen knives with this Tips and Techniques video. Three good kitchen knives are what you need to start cooking.

episodes.title: Preparing Garlic
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Garlic is often the essential ingredient that is required to make a great recipe. Slice, mince, or crush garlic cloves with this startcooking.com Tips and Techniques video.

episodes.title: Irish Bread
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: This traditional Irish bread done the American way is chock full of raisins and caraway seeds, and comes out almost like a cake. Yum!

episodes.title: Pork Chops
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Well it is time for another startcooking.com video and today I am going to prepare pork chops.  They are easy to cook and taste great with mustard sauce.  Add rice and steamed vegetables and you are guaranteed a tasteful and nutritious meal. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Scallops
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Scallops are delicious and can be cooked in minutes! They are perfect when you have no time to cook. You just have to follow a few simple steps and you'll be ready to eat a tasty, zesty meal!

episodes.title: Sweet and Sour Meatballs
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Sweet and sour meatballs are delicious and so easy to make. Learn how to make your own sweet and sour meatballs with these step-by-step instructions!

episodes.title: How to Fry an Egg
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Frying an egg is an essential cooking skill that will open doors to a delicious breakfast. How to fry an egg is actually quite easy, these step-by-step instructions will show you the best way to fry eggs.

episodes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to make the perfect grilled cheese sandwich with this new startcooking recipe video. Bread, cheese and butter is all you will need to make this delicious sandwich. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Stuffed mushrooms make a delicious hors-d'oeurve or an attractive side dish.

episodes.title: Chicken Salad with Wild Rice
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Today's chicken salad is easy to prepare. It tastes great by itself or in sandwiches. Follow the instructions for the recipe and you'll have yourself a great, light meal in no time. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Chicken Fajitas
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Chicken fajitas make for a quick and healthy meal. This video on making chicken fajitas will show you how to make them, one step at a time. Everyone will enjoy this easy chicken fajitas recipe!

episodes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: This butternut squash soup recipe is a delicious treat to serve on a cold day. This video recipe will show you everything you need, from peeling the butternut squash to seasoning the soup - and you'll have a delicious meal in no time! Enjoy!

episodes.title: Apple Crisp
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Apple crisp is a classic recipe loved by all. Learn how to make your own apple crisp from scratch with this easy step-by-step video. Baking this delicious dessert has never been so simple!

episodes.title: Tomato Sauce Recipe
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Knowing how to make tomato sauce is essential. Are you making pizza or preparing pasta? This startcooking.com recipe video shows you how to combine tomatoes and other ingredients to make a versatile and tasteful tomato sauce. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Grilled Chicken – Indoors!
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: You can grill chicken indoors! This video on making grilled chicken will guide you every step of the way. No barbecue needed for this delicious grilled chicken recipe. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Gazpacho
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: A cold soup is often what we need on a warm summer day. So join startcooking in preparing gazpacho. This cold soup is easy to make. Think of it as liquid salad.  And it will make friends and family happy because everyone likes to enjoy a bowl of gazpacho.

episodes.title: Chili Peppers
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Choosing the right hot pepper when preparing a Tex-Mex or chili recipe can be confusing. This startcooking video can help you. Learn how to handle and pick the right jalapeno, chili, or poblano pepper so you can impress your guests with a perfect recipe.

episodes.title: 7 Layer Dip
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: This delicious tex-mex 7 layer dip is a great party dish that everyone will enjoy. Learn how to make your own 7 layer dip recipe with this simple step-by-step video guide.

episodes.title: Vegetable and Chef Salad
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Make your own basic vegetable salad and then transform it into a chef salad with a just a few more ingredients.

episodes.title: Potato Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Potato salad is a classic dish loved by all. This great video will show you how to make your own delicious potato salad with lemon vinaigrette!

episodes.title: Tex-Mex Cheeseburgers
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Add some variations to your burger recipes with these fantastic and delicious tex-mex cheeseburgers! Anyone can cook tasty burgers by following those simple and easy steps to making tex-mex cheeseburgers.

episodes.title: Fruit Salad
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: A simple fruit salad or fruit kabob makes the prettiest dish and is easy to prepare.

episodes.title: Meatloaf
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: The meatloaf is a staple of American cuisine. Learn how to make a delicious homemade meatloaf with the help of this step-by-step video. You'll be cooking a fantastic meatloaf in no time!

episodes.title: Chicken Cutlets
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: This chicken cutlets recipe will be enjoyed by all! Just follow these easy step-by-step instructions that will show you how to make chicken cutlets from scratch. It's a quick and fun recipe!

episodes.title: Sausage and Egg Casserole
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: When you're expecting a group of hungry people for brunch, this scrumptous egg casserole dish will win you great big compliments.

episodes.title: How to Make Fried Rice
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to cook the perfect fried rice with this startcooking video. White rice and a few basic ingredients is all you need to make this delicious recipe. Fried rice is easy to make and a great way to use up leftovers. Enjoy!

episodes.title: How to Cook Pasta
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Are you still cooking pasta in the microwave? Learn the 6 important rules for any pasta recipe with this quick Tips and Techniques video - you'll have everything you need for your pasta dish in no time. Enjoy!

episodes.title: How to Boil an Egg
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Making hard boiled eggs is not as difficult as it seems. My new Tips and Techniques video series will show you just that. In this first video, I focus on the basics and begin by showing you how to boil eggs. Enjoy!

episodes.title: How to Cut an Avocado
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Have you ever wondered how to cut an avocado? Watch this tips and techniques video to find out how to best cut an avocado so you can begin work on your favorite recipe.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: How To: Ginger
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Fresh ginger is often the key ingredient to the perfect sauce, marinade or stir-fry.  Watch this startcooking video to find out more about how to use ginger. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Super-foods Salads
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Startcooking and Fresh Express believe that nutrition and taste go together. Phytonutrients and vitamins make salads super nutritious. Add mangos, tomatoes, berries or almonds and you have a delicious salad. It is that simple. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Apple Snack Attack
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Startcooking and Chiquita have teamed up to show you that there are no limits to what you can do with apples and grapes. Fruit bites can be a lot of fun and they are great sources of phytonutrients and vitamins. Enjoy these healthy fruit snack ideas!

episodes.title: Cutting an Onion
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Learn how to cut onions with Tips and Techniques at startcooking.com. Chop, dice, and mince while watching this video and then start working on your favorite recipe.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: Crack and Separate an Egg
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Separating the yolk of an egg from the white can be a messy operation.  This Tips and Techniques video will provide you with the essential tips to crack and separate an egg. Enjoy!

episodes.title: How to Measure Food
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Measuring tools are essential in the kitchen. This video will help you to use your measuring cups and spoons the best possible way!

episodes.title: Juicing a Lemon
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Juicing a lemon is one of those techniques that is essential to know, but rarely taught. This great video will show you step-by-step the proper way to juice a lemon!

episodes.title: Browning Ground Beef
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: Ground beef is the basis of many recipes, so this easy browning ground beef video will introduce you to everything you need. Whether it's to make casserole, stuffed chili, or taco, this great video will bring you up to speed. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Thawing Ground Beef
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: There are many ways to deal with frozen ground beef. This video guide on thawing ground beef will get you fast on track!

episodes.title: Mixed Bean and Vegetable Soup
episodes.author: Kathy Maister
episodes.summary: This thick, creamy winter soup cooks up in just 35 minutes and makes a hearty main course.
